TextBlock.Text: SENNETTI: Exciting news friends! I have made significant progress towards deciphering our neighborâ€™s language!
NESIA: If you donâ€™t mind my asking, what particulars of their language have you decrypted?

SENNETTI: Mostly common words, such as "and" and "the." Notably, however, I have also puzzled out a couple of names! Specifically, the species refer to themselves as the Dree, and the Dree that I have been working with is known as Ditylum!
AZOLLA: Good work Sennetti! At this rate, weâ€™ll be able to swap discoveries with the Dree in hardly any time at all!
OKALIS: This is wonderful news Sennetti! Does this mean that communication between our species will go more smoothly now?
SENNETTI: Somewhat, but I am still far from completing my translation.
OKALIS: Would this happen to be the same Dree that we first met?
SENNETTI: That is correct! It seems that he is quite eager to help facilitate communications between our two species.
